componentType.description: This plugin records the incoming data live into an EDF file (http://www.edfplus.info/specs/edf.html). So it can be viewed in the EDF-Browser (http://www.teuniz.net/edfbrowser/) simulaneously

property.name: patientID
property.description: ID of the recorded subject

property.name: FileName
property.description: name of the recording file

property.name: reSampling
property.description: incoming data will be re-sampled according to the set frequency

property.name: SamplingRateCH1
property.description: sampling rate for the corresponding channel. Set to zero to deactivate this channel

property.name: SamplingRateCH2
property.description: sampling rate for the corresponding channel. Set to zero to deactivate this channel

property.description: sampling rate for the corresponding channel. Set to zero to deactivate this channel
